metadata.title: CVE-2024-1554 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The `fetch()` API and navigation incorrectly shared the same cache, as thecache key did not include the optional headers `fetch()` may contain.Under the correct circumstances, an attacker may have been able to poisonthe local browser cache by priming it with a `fetch()` response controlledby the additional headers. Upon navigation to the same URL, the user wouldsee the cached response instead of the expected response. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 123.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
